mapper.select: select c.cart_id,p.p_name,c.p_amount,p.p_selling_price,p.p_id,c.userid, p_selling_price*p_amount money, (select IMAGE_ROUTE from images where p_id = c.p_id and IMAGE_RNK = 1) as p_image from cart c join product p on c.p_id = p.p_id where c.userid = #{userid} order by p_name
mapper.update: update cart set p_amount = #{p_amount} where cart_id = #{cart_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where userid = #{userid}
